name: arabic-alphabet
description: Interactive Arabic alphabet learning application with audio pronunciation

scripts.start: python3 -m http.server 8080 || node -e "require('http').createServer((req, res) => require('fs').readFile('index.html', (err, data) => { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'text/html'}); res.end(data); })).listen(8080)"

author: Rui Chen
